_sText:
Allways wanted to make my own aim, or arena, map. A small map for fun play.

The map idea was to create a small arena with two rectangular bases.

I have spent some time creating this map now and it should be bug-free. Please notify me if you find anything that is hovering, get stuck, bugged windows/walls/boxes/barrels/etc or andthing else that should be fixed.

______________________________
Fixes                                            
______________________________

V1.1 - v1.12 fixes:
*Change the tall surouding walls' texture. due the bug while you scope or die that they turn into black or white.
*Fixed the two windows that were connected with the same break trigger.
*Changed barrels to static instead of physics, so they don't lag and wont hurt you anymore.
*Changed the thickness og the ladders.

V1.12 - v1-13 fixes:
*Fixed the ct spawns... ><
